You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

tweets.text:
EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz

After @ClareDinnisEA speech basically saying I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs causing it, I have no power & I‚Äôm too scared to do anything to annoy big industry we need to stop putting any faith in the @EnvAgency & start going higher @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/dWPg0jQUrv
How interesting, is it fixed yet @EnvAgency ? Second time I‚Äôve heard this today. Not acceptable @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/D7GX3OqEy0

Yesterday was #WorldLandroverDay

The trusty #LandroverDefender has been a workhorse for the @EnvAgency for many years and has maintained our #FloodDefences, responded to #incidents and helped protect communities from everything from #Floods to #Fires. https://t.co/YcrhBtCqf4

This petition reached 28,000 signatures it gets a written response from government. Below is what they had to say. No reference to improving the role of regulators @EnvAgency & @Ofwat or lack of investment over the past 30 years by the water industry.
https://t.co/anRPhK7VTX https://t.co/Q4ADbnGxGR

Our garage stinks of pure gas this morning too, if there‚Äôs a gas leak at someone‚Äôs house in Newcastle there is a real risk that they won‚Äôt call the gas board @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @H_S_E #stopthestink #stillstinks #StaffordshireDay https://t.co/GVLtktPmD3

tweets.text: Aaaanybody fancy coming to measure the levels of gas in my home this afternoon? We had to escape last night and apparently it was shocking there so the house will be full of it! @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe We are waiting for your answer and that of @PHE_uk  Clare. Does that picture and letter from an eminent consultant mean nothing? ANSWERS NOW PLEASE.
@StinkStopthe #Staffordshire #StaffordshireDay
@StinkStopthe Have the Environment Agency changed their email address. Tried to email them just now (Guess what about üòâ) and just getting bounce back?

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv
@SarahInNUL @rosamund_ElsFdn @Bigdwazda @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL @BBCNews @itvnews @Channel5N @SOPH_C_ @MumsForLungs @EnvAgency sounds truly awful. Have signed and shared

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @Helen_Clinton The key thing though Simon is NULBC you are all to blame you obviously passed the planning in the 1st place to land fill the land and gave the tender to red industries somebody is making a lot of money at our expense you must never let this company operate in Staffordshire again

The most scary part of all this is waking up thinking it smells ok in the house, then start moving around and you notice it stinks to high heaven of gas. Just checked my cooker as it smells like pure gas. This is dangerous, an accident WILL happen sooner than later #stopthestink

tweets.text: *This* is why we have a phosphate pollution problem in Herefordshire rivers. Massive pile of chicken muck dumped right next to watercourse. Completely against the farming rules for water. I‚Äôve just reported it to @EnvAgency.  Totally unacceptable.  And not an isolated incident. https://t.co/1l45pAbllG

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Does #publichealthengland understand exposure to these toxins is several hours every day when they say no risk to health, short term we don't recover from 1 exposure before next onslaught. #stopthestink

@sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @maireadc_2010 @fayedavies Count me in too , This has gone to far and legal action is needed now not just against @RedIndustries2 but also against @EnvAgencyMids for their lack of action ,and their response to our plight .

@maireadc_2010 @sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @fayedavies @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids It's not the road i'd choose but now it looks like the only one left . I think they bank on people losing interest and leaving things to bumble along , not this community and I hope yours too .

Reflecting on what a fantastic community we have, all walks of life uniting to fight big industry & greed for the sake of our health , our friends & neighbours health & our children #staffordshireday #stopthestink #stillstinks @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe https://t.co/P7porQ2DAK
All we want is fresh air, not too much to ask @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency  https://t.co/facjjTdZed

Remember the dump people from The Walking Dead? That'll be Newcastle-under-Lyme soon, buried under Walleys Quarry @RedIndustries2 because @EnvAgency put wealth before health üí∏ #StopTheStink https://t.co/kScUfnsaOA

tweets.text:
Things I thought I‚Äôd never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ‚Ä¶.

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It‚Äôs really nice to see nature so close to urban centres‚Ä¶.. it‚Äôs called @theoutdoorcity for a reason üôå https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT

The only thing that will satisfy this community is that Filth Mountain is capped all over, closed & restored. The @EnvAgency & British Government need to make that happen @EnvAgency @jamebesa @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/uiecpYaDw6

It‚Äôs sad when you come to despise your own home, that‚Äôs how I‚Äôve started to feel about it because I feel trapped, suffocated & financially ruined if we try & walk away @Cap_it_off @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink @MattHancock @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe https://t.co/2kI3CtPMsW

No surprise. The worst I‚Äôve heard is just over 9 miles. My father in law regularly smells it in the garden at 5 miles.

The whole of Newcastle under Lyme tentatively leaving their window open tonight because it‚Äôs deadline day & permanently capping 1/4 & temp capping another 1/4 is apparently the panacea for our town @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/AsHb5EFglz

Forgot or deliberately omitted @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA 
#stopthestink https://t.co/NfRGQ2Mjg1

tweets.text:
2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today üëá and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 What went wrong at Christmas that caused this Stench to get so much worse, more frequently? You must be able to determine this surely?
